name: Felipe Pires

experience.title: Member of YGM's ECD Team
experience.detail: I'm currently helping out (not) with a YGM project for building a directory for extracurriculars at Yale.

experience.title: Developer of BulldogBook
experience.detail: Chrome Extension that allows Yale students to see suite and residential college information on the profile of other Yale students.

experience.title: Creator of QI Labs
experience.detail: Social network for students interested in extracurricular opportunities. Programmed a wiki system for extracurriculars and a gamified platform where students can solve problems from past scientific olympiads. Open-sourced at github.com/f03lipe/qilabs.

experience.title: CTO & Communtiy Mobilizer at Turma Cidadã
experience.detail: NGO that gives college and high school students in Brazil the opportunity to impact their local communities. Recruited students for volunteering, created the NGO’s website using django-cms and lead the media team for two years

extracurriculars.title: Yale Guild of Makers
extracurriculars.detail: The oldest programming club at Yale.

bio:
Generalist programmer, focused on web development. Collaborating on great things at YGM. I'm interested in the intersection of computer science and humanities, and that's what defines my Yale experience.
Particularly interested in virtual reality and machine learning projects.
smallBio: Generalist programmer, focused on web development. Collaborating on great things at YGM.
